description: Shiina, given name unknown, otherwise referred to by his nickname Shii-chan, is another adult friend of http://anidb.net/ch21554 [Shuuichi] and http://anidb.net/ch21555 [Yoshino]. He was http://anidb.net/ch23414 [Yuki`s] classmate in elementary school, and he eventually became her boyfriend after her transition. Unlike Yuki, Shiina had many friends in school. He generally just watches over Shuuichi and Yoshino with Yuki, but he sometimes does bold and unexpected things, such as grabbing Yoshino`s crotch when he first meets her because he feared that, because Yoshino was dressed as a boy at the time, Yuki might be having an illicit affair with her.
name: Shii-chan
